website_summaries.verdict: Specifically designed for use with the Instant Pot, this silicone pan peels off the sides of your cake with ease.
pros: Genuine accessory designed for use with several Instant Pot models
Design lets you peel the pan off the sides
cons: Springform clip can be difficult to open
It opens more easily when the pan is hot

customer_reviews.title: Springform or Strainer?
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the Instant Pot Electric pressure Cooker Springform Cake Pan with Tempered Glass Base, Premium Non-Stick Silicone...what a big kitchen mess!!, it drips by the joint like a strainer, both the Loaf Pan and the Cake Pan..as always Amazon gave me NO problem with the return/credit, I love my Instant Pot but these to items need improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Maruchy

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: The minute I opened the box I knew there would be a problem. There is a gap between the bottom of the pan and the removable sides Checked for a leak with water and it flowed right out. Took it apart cleaned the joints, reassembled making sure to push everything tight. Still leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Justaname0860

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after initial wash, hadn't even used it yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is getting returned. What a piece of junk! It is impossible to get it to seal all the way. Two adults, lots of time, some heating, lots of stretching and it still has a gap. Completely useless. Save yourself the trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: This is not the greatest. You can't get the silicone back together after washing it. There's a gap that not even the clip that fits over the ends won't fully close. It took two of us to even get it back together. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: CGaudreau

customer_reviews.title: ... was excited to get this but I am not happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this but I am not happy with it. The silicon ring does not join completely over the glass bottom which causes it to leak. I have tried several different ways to complete the seal but it continues to have a slow leak. You can still use it but you get all the leaky residue in the bottom of the pot. I ordered this instead of some of the other pans because this was made by Instant Pot. I love mu IP but this isn't what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: William Howard

customer_reviews.title: Never got to use it
customer_reviews.text: Before I even got to use this, I washed it in the sink by hand. When placing the silicone back around the glass bottom, the edges did not meet snugly and and liquid leaked out. Disappointed...I was so excited to use it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This thang works great for my wangs!
customer_reviews.text: Since this steamer basket doesn’t have handles, I use this in conjunction with the Instant Pot handled rack. I used it mostly for my deeeelicious’ wangs. I’ve also included a picture of the max temperatures this steamer basket can handle (-40F to 464F, or -40C to 240C). I wash on top rack of dishwasher, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: River Stix

customer_reviews.title: Instant pot cake mold
customer_reviews.text: April 28, 2020: I bought this because my wife found a recipe for lemon cheesecake in an instant pot. Easily put together, easily cooked, and the cake came out great. Silicone molds are one of the biggest pains to clean, though. They flop everywhere, and you can't really get a solid grip on them. The other side of that equation is you don't have to worry about breaking it if you have to grip it weird. If you're into instant pot cakes, do yourself a favor and get this.
customer_reviews.author: Big Trev

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & clean!
customer_reviews.text: This trivet is amazing! The long handles made it really easy to get my 7 cup Pyrex out of the pot when cooking. Also used it to cook chicken. The chicken didn't stick one bit like on the metal trivet. I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Unable to seal ring completely
customer_reviews.text: This product appeared to be well designed until I actually tried to see how it worked. No instructions came with it at all, but I discovered how the clip slides off and on to seal the silicone ring around the glass bottom. It looks like it should work, but it doesn't. Once the clip was removed, it was very difficult to connect the 2 ends of the silicone back together and slide the clip back on. Even after trying several times and pushing the clip all the way down, the ends of the ring would not come together completely at the bottom to seal the ring onto the glass bottom to prevent leaks. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Good and sturdy steamer basket. However, there are NO handles on it .... you will need to use a foil sling or tongs to pull it out of the Instant Pot. There are no "legs" on this steamer basket, so you WILL need to use a trivet to keep basket ingredients out of the water. Not sure why some reviews are saying otherwise concerning this steamer basket. Perhaps Amazon combines all posts pertaining to Instant Pot products and then shares them on every IP product page, whether or not they refer to that particular product (i.e., why are there posts about a springform pan on a steamer basket product page?) No matter what, this is a nice product!
customer_reviews.author: William Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Good, has some serious flaws though
customer_reviews.text: I made a pumpkin cheesecake in the Instant Pot with this. The cheesecake turned out great, so overall the pan did its job. That being said, other reviewers are correct that it can be a challenge to get the silicone to go back onto the glass bottom correctly. Also, it leaked a fair bit of butter out of the crust. I would have really liked the pan to be more leakproof.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: good to experiment with
customer_reviews.text: takes a while for the smell of the silicone mould to dissipate, wash throughly before using. if the glass plate is not well seated into the silicone mould beforehand, liquid contents can leak through the slide clip holding the silicone mould together is an essential component, without it the cake pan will not hold together so don't lose it, there is no reason to put it or the cake pan in the dishwasher anyway, hand wash/dry/store assembled
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This review Is for the Spring form Pan. I made my 1st cheesecake ever in my life and I am not a good Baker but it was absolutely perfect in my instant pot. No need to grease anything Or use parchment paper as it does not stick. I'm very happy that it has a glass bottom I can serve it on and cut on it I was a little confused how to open the Spring form As I didn't practice before I Baked but it slides upwards to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Amac

customer_reviews.title: Leaked like a sieve.
customer_reviews.text: I thought a silicone springform pan was an awesome idea. When I got it I was a bit confused by the mechanics of it - it has a glass bottom & a slide closure that is very difficult to remove. I got it all figured out& tried my first dish in it - an egg casserole. It leaked. Not just a little. A LOT. This was not user error. I put it together correctly. It just doesn't seal properly. I was SO disappointed. I cleaned it and processed my return immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Emily D.

customer_reviews.title: Way too wobbly
customer_reviews.text: The legs are made of a soft rubber and are shaky .. the Instant Pot has a slightly raised center in the pot and the center leg "wobbles" and bowls DO NOT sit on it properly. We find that the metal "steamer" basket works substantially better. No I do not recommend this item and would NOT buy it again....
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Steamer Basket
customer_reviews.text: Using the 6 qt instant pot and made a lot of hard boiled eggs. This worked as advertised and the eggs were good. My mother gave me the recipe to make hard boiled eggs when I got married and the instant pot makes hard boiling fool proof and they come out perfect. It is ok if you can't boil water just get the instant pot and gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good steaming basket that should have been included with the steaming kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product, but it really should have been included with the Instapot steaming kit (instead of the broiler) to save the consumer some cash. You get the same quality steaming basket, but should be aware that it is silicone and thus be prepared to deal with smells that are difficult to get rid of.

customer_reviews.title: Good gadget but risky unstable unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I use this to steam chunks of veggies in the microwave as well as in instant pot not good for greens as the holes are not round but large rectangles and the bottom is also wiggly and unstable I use this with an existing stainless steel trivet with handles I have I haven’t found a high steam rack with silicone handles yet
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with our Insta Pot
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected although I really did like how easy it was to get the edges off of the cake after cooking. I wish my metal pans could be like that. The glass base seems solid enough. It does take a little bit of effort to get all the channels and nooks of the silicone band clean after use though. If you want to try cakes in the Insta Pot I would recommend this pan...
customer_reviews.author: Bmcgnh

customer_reviews.title: Springform pan worked perfectly in Instant Pot - but...
customer_reviews.text: The springform pan is sized for cheesecake recipes that call for 16 oz of cream cheese. The recipe I used called for using a strip of parchment to 'raise' the sides of this pan, so I could cover it with paper toweling (to absorb drips) and foil (to seal it all up.) While the cake was tasty, it wasn't pretty. Next time I'll bake it in the oven instead, or cover with paper towel and then wrap with foil without extending the sides vertically.
customer_reviews.author: Goldnotsilver

customer_reviews.title: Melts in boiling water.
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it, it slightly melted in boiling water during a 6 minute period, .
customer_reviews.author: Mariner

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy with perfect handles
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, perfect handles that stay cool so it is easy to pull it out of your electric pressure cooker with your food on it right away.They are also nice and long so they are easy to grab, but fold over the food well. It leaves plenty of room underneath for fluid and foods as well for a great braising liquid that gives great flavor and moisture to meats. A cooking pan would fit well on it. I am so glad I purchased this item!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Simburger

customer_reviews.title: Great for instant pot.
customer_reviews.text: I do like using this silicon pan, but the clip can be a little difficult to get fully closed at times. I like to use this in my instant pot & works great in it. I still spray it with pan spray just to give it a little additional help from items sticking. It is also easy to throw in the top shelf of the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: M. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Good accessory for my Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: This was OK for a cheesecake and a tortilla type casserole for the Instant Pot, but I'm not used to using flimsy silicone. --which takes some getting used to. It's easy to squish your sides in. (Hence I bought another all-metal type after this.) It did the job, and the glass bottom makes it nice to serve on. Cleaning is OK...it takes a little effort to get the side, bottom and closure thing to work...just awkward. I'm don't love it or hate it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lofthus

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like this pan at all
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this pan at all. I works better to just use the tinfoil method for meatloaf in the IP. This traps all the grease so the meat is extra greasy and when broiling it expands and is impossible to get the "easy slide" clip off. I returned mine and will use my little metal pan or tinfoil going forward.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: STEAM RACK
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept for this steam rack, and really loved the easy to grab handles. Unfortunately, after only 5 or 6 uses (when making cheesecakes in my InstantPot) one of the grab handles broke near the base of the unit. Now it is really only useful as another trivet. This item was NOT abused, so I must presume it was defective materials. Sadly, out of date on return window.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Every instant pot user should have one of these!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, I made 2 cheesecakes using this pan in my instant pot. Both turned out perfect. I did put parchment on the bottom just so it was easier to slide onto plate. So easy to unclasp ring. Very easy to wash. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for safety & convenience!
customer_reviews.text: I love this trivet. It makes it so easy to remove food or a pan or pot, rather than using a foil sling and hoping it won't break or let the pan or pot fall off. I find it needs soaking in hot, soapy water to get food out of the nooks and crannies of it's used to support food directly, but I just leave it soaking while we eat and food comes off easily. No more burned fingers now that I have this. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan MannionTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Better
customer_reviews.text: My first one I sent back, it didn’t seal properly (leaked where the silicone meets with the dovetail and plastic clip area). My replacement seals much better, no leaking. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: This has eliminated by need for a foil sling when making cheesecakes in my pressure cooker. The arms are long enough that you can use them to lift pans out of the pressure cooker liner without a lot of fuss. It's a little bit wobbly, though, since the legs are also made of silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Magical Selan

customer_reviews.title: Hated it
customer_reviews.text: I tried to make a cake in this. It looks like it would be leak proof. It isnt. If I would have known it, I wouldnt have bought it. If you are looking for a leak proof container, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: Great item to make a little loaf in the instant pot. It was safe to put it in the broiler to brown the insant pot bread as the pot doesnt brown it.
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this when I bought my Instant Pot as I wanted to stick to the IP brands because I wanted the best compatibility. I had my IP for 2 years before I even used this. It is not hard to clean and holds the cheesecake shape just okay. The silicone ring had gotten a little bent in the packaging. So I am a little concerned that it will get straightened out. The cheesecake I made turned out well and didn't leak out the sides. So that is a definite benefit. I might try another pan from another manufacturer to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Not tight fitting
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewer have stated, the walls do not completely close and there is leakage. It is easy to clean, but even after hand-washing in hot water, it would not fit back together at the seam. I performed a water test to see how much leakage there would be, it ran quite a bit. I lined the entire pan with parchment; it slowed the leak, but not sufficiently to reuse for any liquid-type casserole. It would probably work for a thicker pasta dish, but I see the fit getting more loose over time.
customer_reviews.author: "rlreinecke"

customer_reviews.title: Pour something liquid into this product and test it beforehand.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I bought this one. The silicon sides never sealed so my cheesecake batter ran out onto my counter top. It cleaned up easily in the dishwasher before I threw it into the garbage bin.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: VERY well made product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product. Nice and stiff so it doesn't flop when full. It is tightish within the 6 quart, so you may want to put it on a trivet or make sure you have good tongs to pull it out.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie B

customer_reviews.title: A Useful Product
customer_reviews.text: My CrockPot pressure cooker wire rack started rusting a few times after use. This works as a rack or a basket. The pressure cooker manufacturers should include a similar product in their cookers instead of metal ones. This won’t scratch the non stick surface of the pot either.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: No scratches, no rust
customer_reviews.text: Really like the fact that this pan features a glass bottom...no damage to a non-stick surface ...and no metal parts to rust in a wet environment.
customer_reviews.author: scribbler

customer_reviews.title: Quality control not good!
customer_reviews.text: This item was difficult to open to release the cake, and once open, the glass edge of the bottom piece was very rough. I tossed the cake into the trash, fearing that tiny shards of glass might have gotten into the batter when I baked it.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Okie

customer_reviews.title: A bit wobbly, but the handles are good
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in an 8 qt pot, so the handles are the perfect height for easy grabbing. But as others have noticed, the legs aren't as well supported as they should be and can wobble. This isn't usually a problem in the pot, but I've almost had some things fall over when I put the thing down on the counter. Should be an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: HeadintheClouds

customer_reviews.title: Better than tin foil....but
customer_reviews.text: It's kindda hard to put it back on together. I bought it to make the meatloaf because I didn't want to use the tin foil. It still leaks a little but good to have one if you don't like the tin foil.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: it does work
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly what it says it is. the only negative that i can see is that it has a black slide that holds the upper portion together. this requires to juggling and breath holding to get it back onto the product after you clean it. my son about freaked his mind out when he realized he was washing a glass circle.
customer_reviews.author: Kat D.

customer_reviews.title: Aweome
customer_reviews.text: Everyone thinks IPs are like crack cocaine- you gotta try it and then you are hooked! Problem is, the trivet that comes with it is a total PITA to get out when it's hot. This thing is the best. Cheap, comes in 2 days, easy to get stuff out of the liner- love it.
customer_reviews.author: KM Montegue

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this pan. But the design is poor. there's a big gap at the bottom and it leaks like a sieve. They should have made the clip slide on from the bottom to the top instead of the other way around and perhaps that would have diminished the gap. I really like the design but it just leaks too much.
customer_reviews.author: BlueBellBlue

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Works well, holds a good amount of food. Would be better if it had feet to hold above water. Instead you need a trivet as well.
customer_reviews.author: downpantera

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use with an Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to pan for Instant Pot cheese cakes and lasagnas. If you're just using an oven, the spring-form or push pans work just as well, but for any pressure cooker I think this is easier to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Earl the Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Best cheesecake pan for your IP
customer_reviews.text: I love my IP and was anxious to do the cheesecake #17 but wanted to have the proper pan. This springform worked perfectly, released easily and was well worth the purchase. I've used it several times now. It washes well and goes together easily. Does not leak!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Leaky at the bottom.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about getting the Instant Pot branded Spring Ring set. When I took it out of the box to wash and dry it., I put it back together and tested it for leaks, and we’ll it did leak. I’m glad I didn’t waste food and time, just think about the mess I might have had. It’s a good idea but bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Great for any pressure cooker. It makes lifting out food and bowls so much easier. Bought this as gift for a coworker who just got her first pressure cooker. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: The handles are kind of "springy" but after a little ...
customer_reviews.text: The handles are kind of "springy" but after a little experimenting I found a way to tuck them under in order to stow in the cupboard when not in use. The base provides a much more stable surface for small silicone muffin cups than the trivet included with the Instant Pot, which is helpful when making egg cups.
customer_reviews.author: jll

customer_reviews.title: Leaks - not so good for liquids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this springform pan 3 times for making frittata in my Instant Pot. The first time I used it, it worked fine. The second and third times, it leaked egg all over the bottom of the pot. The silicon does not completely seal. I tried lining it with parchment paper before putting the egg mix in but that didn't help - it still leaked. It's a mess to clean up. I would return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Shari B

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and weak
customer_reviews.text: Product feet are weak. They bend and doesn't allow it to sit flat. Tips sideways causing my cheesecake to be in level. At this point I wish I had bought something different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantasti Instant Pot Rack
customer_reviews.text: This rack is far better than the metal ones that come with the Instant Pot. I put my eggs right on the silicone rack to steam them for hardboiled eggs. It is so easy. It works great if you need to lift something out of the pot as well as the handles come all the way to the top. It is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my power cook XL. Meat loaf, lasagna, etc: recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gill

customer_reviews.title: Melted a bit.
customer_reviews.text: Works great but one of the legs melted a bit in the Instant Pot on first use. I am concerned now with more of the product melting while I cook my food.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Haley

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Way to small to really do anything with. Fits great in a 6qt. But to small to make anything with. Not worth spending the money on it. And no videos or recipes using it anywhere for ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: As other reviews said - the springform cake pan is ...
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews said - the springform cake pan is defective out of the box. The edges don't seal and any contents will leak. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cheesecake pan! It's easy to use, Easy to clean, and easy to store. Now, if it would only make the cheesecake last longer - it seems to make my cheesecake disappear as well! lol!
customer_reviews.author: BlestMe

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item without using because I was disappointed with it. There was a gap near the bottom and I felt it would have been a possible leak point
customer_reviews.author: H.B.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and durability.
customer_reviews.text: I used this rack recently when making cheesecake. The legs are sturdy and the long handles made it easy to remove from pot. I just set them out to dry after use. I highly recommend them !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Have only used a couple of times, but so far I like. It is hard to get the meatloaf smell out of the silicone, so I recommend one for sweet and one for savory. Clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: paula von gemmingen

customer_reviews.title: No more burnt hands or dropped food!
customer_reviews.text: Makes pulling food out of the instant pot a breeze! The only reason I deducted a star is because the handles are so long. Sometimes they prevent my lid from sealing properly and it can take a bit to get them out of the way. A half an inch shorter would probably prevent that issue. I still recommend them though.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Good spring form cake pan, though it can leak
customer_reviews.text: Overall the Instant Pot Silicone Springform Cake Pan is very useful and works as advertised. The silicone is very easy to clean. The main problem is that the seal on the edge (see pictures) creates a small gap where some cake batter leaks out, though not much leaks out. It is difficult to remove from the Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.author: Paper Crown

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this pan until I got it and wasn’t able to use it because it leaks. The concept of the pan to go in the pressure cooker is great...just need to get one that doesn’t leak
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to reassemble
customer_reviews.text: My one complaint is the seem to get it back into a ring onto the bottom is very difficult to get back together properly. I had to mess with it for a very long time to get it sealed properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie abele

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of months ago. I just used it yesterday. It leaked everywhere in my pressure cooker. Ruined my meal and wasted all of my ingredients. The clip doesn't hold the silicone together. No matter what I did it would not seal. I should have purchased a traditional metal springform pan. If there was a way to give zero stars I would. Do not bother purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie L. Carden

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this mold and make a cheese cake in my InstaPot. It came out terrible, the smell is awful. I’m sure it’s toxic. This item should not be sold here.
customer_reviews.author: mahesh sahu

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchade
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make a cheesecake in my IP, I was not disappointed! The cheesecake turned out absolutely perfect. I will never bake another in the oven again! This pan is the perfect addition to my IP! It'seems also a breeze to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Trula

customer_reviews.title: Great for testing in the FAGOR LUX Multicooker.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, after a few tries for flourless cakes in the multicooker, works well in the oven as well. I would not use it in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Fred, The Cook

customer_reviews.title: Stackable in Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Stackable.I had one so brought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Swann

customer_reviews.title: ... pressure cooker and this one is by far my favorite. Much easier to clean than the stainless steel ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several other trivets for my electric pressure cooker and this one is by far my favorite. Much easier to clean than the stainless steel ones I have. Very well made, too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Easter

customer_reviews.title: Springform pan springs open!
customer_reviews.text: There is no clip or anything to keep the form from expanding. Thus a mess . Not sure if perhaps a piece is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Deb

customer_reviews.title: His do you use this thing
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made but did not come with any instructions. The Instant Pot manual does not give hints on using either. I am excited to try this but recipes are hard to find
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: So far this works pretty well. I did notice some oil on the bottom of the glass when I removed it from the oven so there is a little leaking but not enough for me to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Reinke

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my instant pot for cheese cakes. Worked out perfectly. Very nicely made. I love the glass bottom.
customer_reviews.author: kookie1966

customer_reviews.title: Leaking/gaps
customer_reviews.text: When locked, there was a gap on the bottom and on the sides, so not able to use it without leaking.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Great way to prevent burned knuckles
customer_reviews.text: This can replace the metal rack that came with the instant pot. The flexible handles allow you to remove a roast or disposable pan without reaching inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It worked well, but after taking it apart and washing it once it was hard to make even at the seam when put back together. It still worked perfectly and nothing leaked, it was just a little crooked. Still would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for lifting things in and out of your instapot.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously hard to clean. Spent more time cleaning it than cooking with it. I had to bend and stretch it so much during cleaning, it feels like it will not last long. Thankful for easy returns.
customer_reviews.author: B.R.

customer_reviews.title: A great gizmo for the instant pot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gizmo for the instant pot. Keeps items a little higher up than the trivet that comes with the instant pot ... and since it’s flexible it more easily accommodates some containers that fit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a bad taste....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it was going to be perfect for my 6 qt instant pot and the fit was great! It worked well, but it leaves a silicone taste on the food I have made in it. Tried airing it out, washing with vinegar, etc... with no luck. I will be getting rid of it and purchasing the Fat Dadio pan instead.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Smith

customer_reviews.title: it dose NOT fit the instant pot dou mini but it fits my 8qt perfect
customer_reviews.text: it dose NOT fit the instant pot duo mini but it fits my 8qt perfect- it is a great help when cooking pot in pot- very sturdy to lift a heavy load-
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE D.

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for the instant pot
customer_reviews.text: Made a magnificent cheese cake in my instant pot with this. I was afraid it was going to be too small but it easily fed 6 adults at a dinner party. I love the glass bottom which made an excellent presentation. Didn’t have to try to scrape the cake off the base! Live it
customer_reviews.author: Donna G

customer_reviews.title: Try something else.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the silicon imperfections and leakage from the bottom, but I am at fault for not reading reviews ahead of time. will not recommend, will not buy again. Did make some cakes in the IP but was overall disappointed from this product's quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Abutbul

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect in my instant pot! I made yummy french toast with it!
customer_reviews.author: Booklover_lex

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The slide close on the end is tricky to work & has to be lined up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: Since my son accidentally threw away the metal trivet that came with my Instant Pot, I was happy to find this one that had the handles like the original. However, on the first use of the trivet, one of the handles broke as I was lifting out ribs I had cooked. I'm so very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: great for meatloaf
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Instant Pot, had to try meatloaf & potatoes This lil guy is amazing!!! Theres a glass insert on the bottom and once you undo the side clasp it literally peels away!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Really difficult
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and find it is extremely hard to slide the clip off and on. IP says they will loosen up with use, but right out of the box, presumably the pans are closed correctly, I put water in them and they leaked. I'm sending them and will try a traditional steel springform pan.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Fits 6qt. Pressure Cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Great silicone steamer basket. Bought it for our 6qt. Instant Pot. Great quality, buy one you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C. Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Had to exchange
customer_reviews.text: The silicon stuck to the glass and ripped when trying to open up the pan to separate the glass from the silicon. Hoping I just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGurl

customer_reviews.title: If I could give 0 stars I would
customer_reviews.text: look else where for a similar product. This leaks and is a Pain in the derrière to reassemble. Garbage
customer_reviews.author: mswtmn

customer_reviews.title: My least favorite pan
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this pan as the sides are soft. I thought I would like the silicone pan but I like the sturdy sides of a traditional pan so the cheese cake does not get damaged in transport or even removing from the instant pot.
customer_reviews.author: Lori McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Handy accessory
customer_reviews.text: Instant pot steamer rack. Works well and is easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: Zman

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pan about 5 times. It is fabulous! Easy to remove my cheesecake and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carol T

customer_reviews.title: Fits ninja foodi
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if it had extended handles molded into the silicone to make it easier to pull out of the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: OK for a few items. Shallow, not full depth, need to rest on a rack to keep out of water
customer_reviews.text: OK for a few items. Shallow, not full depth, needs to rest on a rack to keep it out of the water. A better value is a large steaming basket like 6qt Instant Pot Steamer Basket.
customer_reviews.author: NigelDH

customer_reviews.title: Not a good springform
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t waste my money on this item. It’s poorly designed to the point where what you make doesn’t even come out round. It’s a springform... it’s supposed to be round. The sliding clamp was a good idea but it doesn’t help you at all to try and have uniformity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Genuine Instant Pot Silicone Springform Cake Pan
product_meta.description: Style Name:Cake PanGenuine Instant Pot silicone springform pan is ideal for cheesecake, regular cake and other delicious dishes. It is designed to fit onto the silicone steam rack for easy removal from your Instant Pot. The clips hold the pan together and open to allow easy release. With the tempered glass base one may prepare, cut, and serve on the same platter. Internal Diameter: 6.5”, Depth: 2.5”
feature_bullets: Designed for the instant pot multi use programmable pressure cooker 5, 6 and 8 quart: ip duo60, ip lux60, ip lux60v3, smart 60, ultra 6, iplux80, ip duo80, ip csg60 and ip csg50
Tempered glass base to easily prepare, cut and serve on the same platter, made of the highest standards of food grade safe silicone
Make instant desserts such as cheese cake, cake and more
Made from fda & lfgb tested inert food safe silicone & bpa free, heat resistant to 450f (230c), dishwasher & freezer safe
Genuine instant pot multi use programmable pressure cooker accessory

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,996 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
